pages.text: $(item)Altars$() are the cornerstone of any witch's lair. They can be used to collect energy -henceforth referred to as $(marked)ME$() (Magical Energy). This energy is essential to most witchcraft, and is collected from nearby plants. You'll want many different plants to collect maximal power.$(br2)You may also place $(marked)swords$(), $(marked)pentacles$(), and $(marked)wands$() atop the altar to modify it.

$(marked)Swords$() will increase the storage multiplier. $(marked)Pentacles$(), such as $(item)Skulls and $(item)Gems$() will increase gain. $(marked)Wands$() such as $(l:bewitchment:tools/candelabras)Candelabras$() and $(item)Torches$() will give a flat bonus on capacity.$(br2)$(item)Altars$() are created by putting carpets on their base block. The base block is of cosmetic nature only and tied to one of the three realms.$(br2)Nearby $(item)Altars$() will fill a player's $(marked)internal ME buffer$(), which is used for magic such as $(l:bewitchment:tools/brooms)flying brooms$().
